name: Attack Speed $godName
description: You need to build atleast 4 attack speed items into your build

name: Movement Speed $godName
description: You need to build atleast 4 movement speed items into your build

name: Terra Incognita
description: You may only take the opponents jungle buffs

name: Cover it all
description: You need 1 physical protection item, 1 magical protection, 1 movement speed item, 1 damage item, 1 stacking item and 1 attack speed item

name: What is damage?
description: You may NOT buy any damage increasing items

name: [VSTB]
description: You must return to the base every 4 minutes.

name: Jungle Control
description: You cannot kill minions while one of your jungle buffs is up $range 2-5 - $range 1-3
